雪釣り: (ゆきづり) - game in which children use a piece of charcoal on a string to create and lift up snowballs

雪隠詰め: (せっちんづめ) - cornering someone (orig. an opponent's king in shogi)

雪霰: (ゆきあられ) - soft hail; snow pellets

雪風: (ゆきかぜ) - snow-bearing wind; wind bringing snow

雰囲気を壊す: (ふんいきをこわす) - to spoil the mood
雲の上: (くものうえ) - above the clouds/heaven; the Imperial Court; something unreachable/place of out of reach
雲の上の存在: (くものうえのそんざい) - god-like existence; person far higher (in hierarchy, etc.) than oneself
雲の峯: (くものみね) - clouds that stand like a mountain peak during the summer
雲の峰: (くものみね) - clouds that stand like a mountain peak during the summer

雲一つない: (くもひとつない) - cloudless (sky); without a cloud (in the sky)
雲上: (うんじょう) - above the clouds; the heavens

雲井: (くもい) - sky; cloud; distant place/high place; imperial court

雲切れ: (くもぎれ) - gap between the clouds
雲助: (くもすけ) - palanquin bearer; coolie; wandering robber
雲助根性: (くもすけこんじょう) - (yoji) predatory nature; rapacious disposition
雲合い: (くもあい) - look of the sky
雲呑: (ワンタン) - wonton (Chinese dumpling) (chi: wantan); won ton; wantan; wanton; wuntun
雲壌: (うんじょう) - clouds and earth; great difference
雲居: (くもい) - sky; cloud; distant place/high place; imperial court
雲形定規: (くもがたじょうぎ) - French curve
雲散霧消: (うんさんむしょう) - (yoji) vanishing like mist
雲梯: (うんてい) - overhead ladder/horizontal ladder/monkey bars; yunti (scaling ladder used for escalade in ancient China)

雲水行脚: (うんすいあんぎゃ) - (yoji) itinerant monk being on pilgrimages to many lands
雲泥万里: (うんでいばんり) - (yoji) being poles apart; (there being) all the difference in the world
